diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Data Mining.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    DataMining[Data Mining] --> Preprocessing[Data Preprocessing]
    DataMining --> Algorithms[Mining Algorithms]
    DataMining --> Patterns[Pattern Discovery]
    Preprocessing --> Cleaning[Data Cleaning]
    Preprocessing --> Transformation[Transformation]
    Algorithms --> Classification[Classification]
    Algorithms --> Clustering[Clustering]
    Patterns --> Association[Association Rules]
    Patterns --> Trends[Trend Analysis]
